narrative.narrative: FlySafair is the subsidiary of Safair, an airline that does both cargo and passenger charters. FlySafair however is a scheduled low cost airline started in 2013 and serves domestic South Africa. They are based at Cape Town. They have four 737-400's and serve 4 airports. Johannesburg,George and Port Elizabeth are the 3 outside of Cape Town. Their first flight was October 16,2014.
